title: TOWIE's Olivia Attwood slips into leather leggings and thigh-high suede boots as filming continues
text:
She has certainly ruffled a few feathers since joining this series of TOWIE, her latest being Courtney Green.

But Olivia Attwood continued her reality TV reign as she headed to film scenes with best pals Chloe Sims and Clelia Theodorou in Essex on Wednesday.

The reality star, 28, put on a racy display in leather leggings and thigh-high suede boots as she headed to a karaoke bar, joined by James Lock and Pete Wicks.

Leading the way: Olivia Attwood put on a racy display in leather leggings and thigh-high suede boots as she headed to a karaoke bar with Chloe Sims and Clelia Theodorou

Tucking a simple black vest, which teased a hint of her surgically-enhanced cleavage, into her leggings, Olivia dressed down the look by shrugging a black and white checked flannel shirt over her shoulders

The Love Island star accessorised the look with a gold chain necklace and a £3,500 black Lady Dior bag.

She wore her hair in voluminous curls and finished off her filming outfit with a bronzed make-up look.

Keeping it casual: The reality star, 28, dressed down the look by shrugging a black and white checked flannel shirt over her shoulder

Expensive taste: The Love Island star accessorised the look with a gold chain necklace and a £3,500 black Lady Dior bag

Olivia's appearance comes after her explosive row in Marbella with Courtney where she tried to fling a plate of olives at her and called her a pygmy goat.

However, Olivia received plenty of support from TOWIE fans as they watched her come face to face with Courtney, 24, to discuss their bad blood.

In the argument, Olivia accused Courtney of being a liar after Courtney claimed Olivia had called her a pig during their Marbella bust up.

Olivia said: 'Courtney, you are a liar. I never called you a pig, I called you a little goat.'

Not impressed, Courtney responded: 'You think that's any better, calling me an animal, a goat? Do you think that's any better?'

Busty display: Olivia tucked a simple black vest, which teased a hint of her surgically-enhanced cleavage, into her leggings

Courtney insisted Olivia's words to her were unacceptable and said: 'Because you were threatening me, that you were going to drag me down and put up a noose by my head. I have to protect myself.'

Chloe Meadows, Clelia and Amber Turner also got involved in the dispute.

After another few minutes of arguing, Olivia relented and acknowledged she had lost her temper but told Courtney she should not have called her 'trash'.

Olivia said: 'Look, I'm sorry for losing my temper. I'll put my hands up and say I was out of line, straight.

'But when you called me trash, you called me a trashy mess, I've been through s**t in my life. You wouldn't know that but that word for me is a trigger and it just gets me in a place and I just lost it.'
description: The reality star, 28, put on a racy display in leather leggings and thigh-high suede boots as she headed to a karaoke bar to film for TOWIE on Wednesday.
